text: Omar Quintana Baquerizo (March 22, 1944 â€“ April 3, 2020) was an Ecuadorian politician and sports businessman. Quintana was born in Quito. He was a member of the Ecuadorian Roldosist Party (PRE) and Institutional Renewal Party of National Action (PRIAN) political parties. Quintana was in the former National Congress of Ecuador from 2003 to 2005, including as the President of the National Congress from January 5, 2005, until April 20, 2005. Quinata was the former director of C.S. Emelec, a professional football sports club based in Guayaquil. Quintana died on April 3, 2020 in Guayaquil of COVID-19 at the age of 76. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic Category:Businesspeople from Guayaquil Category:Presidents of the National Congress of Ecuador Category:Politicians from Quito Category:Sportspeople from Guayaquil Category:Sportspeople from Quito Category:Politicians from Guayaquil
title: Omar Quintana
